Title: Python
ShortDescription: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its simplicity and readability. It is widely used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.

Title: JavaScript
ShortDescription: JavaScript is a versatile scripting language primarily used for web development. It enables interactive web pages and is commonly used alongside HTML and CSS.

Title: Java
ShortDescription: Java is a popular object-oriented programming language known for its platform independence. It is widely used for building enterprise-scale applications, mobile apps, and web servers.

Title: C++
ShortDescription: C++ is a powerful, high-performance programming language used for system/software development, game development, and performance-critical applications. It offers both low-level and high-level features.

Title: Ruby
ShortDescription: Ruby is a dynamic, object-oriented programming language known for its simplicity and productivity. It is often used for web development, prototyping, and automation.

Title: Swift
ShortDescription: Swift is a modern, powerful programming language developed by Apple for iOS, macOS, watchOS, and tvOS app development. It combines performance with safety and ease of use.
